text: Brigitte Haas (born 1964) is a Liechtenstein lawyer and politician who has been the Prime Minister-designate of Liechtenstein since 2025. Haas was the Patriotic Union's candidate for prime minister in the 2025 general election. The party won the majority in the election, making Haas the first female head of government in the country's history. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Liechtenstein
title: Brigitte Haas
